title: Alloy Wheel Refurbishment
desp: Restore your scratched, oxidized, or dull wheels back to showroom condition. We strip, clean, repair, and repaint to match your original or custom look.

title: Crack or Bend Repair
desp: Hit a pothole or curb? We use hydraulic straightening and welding methods to fix minor cracks and bends, ensuring safety and roadworthiness.

title: CNC Diamond Cut Finish
desp: Give your wheels that premium, mirror-like finish. Our computer-guided lathe ensures flawless precision and depth for modern alloy designs.

title: Wheel Straightening
desp: Bent rims can cause vibrations and tire damage. We accurately straighten wheels to factory spec without compromising structure.

title: Cosmetic Repair
desp: From curb rash to deep scuffs, we sand, fill, and repaint affected areas to make the damage vanish completely.

title: Wheel Personalization
desp: Turn your wheels into a reflection of your style and personality. Contact The Wheel Master today to discuss wheel personalization options and give your car a truly unique look.

title: Wheel Alignment/Balancing
desp: Don’t let misaligned or unbalanced wheels compromise your drive. Contact The Wheel Master today to book a Wheel Alignment & Balancing Service and enjoy a smoother, safer, and more efficient driving experience.

title: Alloy wheel health check up and Service
desp: Don’t wait for a small issue to turn into a costly problem. Book your Alloy Wheel Health Check-Up and Service today and ensure your wheels remain safe, reliable, and looking their best.

title: Break Calliper Painting
desp: At The Wheel Master, we believe even the smallest details matter. With our Brake Caliper Painting service, your wheels won’t just perform – they’ll stand out.
